description.p: Returns the arc tangent of an angle expressed in radians.
Returns the arc tangent of the angle.

discussion.p: The Atan function returns the arc tangent of an angle specified as Radians.

example.caption: Atan() function executed on the Northwind Access database

page.example: SELECT FIRST 1 atan(4.3) AS EXPR1 FROM Products = 1.34229968750303
